thread.title: Blac Chyna puts relationship drama aside to wish Rob Kardashian happy birthday with sweet snap
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna puts relationship drama aside to wish Rob Kardashian happy birthday with sweet snap

author: Vicki Newman
title: Blac Chyna puts relationship drama aside to wish Rob Kardashian happy birthday with sweet snap
text:
Blac Chyna puts relationship drama aside to wish Rob Kardashian happy birthday with sweet snap The on/off couple are currently living apart Share Blac Chyna wished Rob Kardashian a happy birthday by sharing a cute picture of them together (Photo: blacchyna@instagram)   
Blac Chyna may not be living with Rob Kardashian at the minute but she put their relationship drama to one side to wish him a happy birthday. 
The on/off couple - who have daughter Dream together - are currently living apart, but Chyna took to Instagram to send him a message on his special day. 
She shared a picture of them smiling together and wrote: "Happy Birthday @robkardashian." 
Rob's family also took to the picture-sharing site to send him love on his birthday. Rob and Chyna are currently living apart (Photo: E!) They have baby Dream together (Photo: Instagram/blacchyna) 
His sister Khloe shared some footage from their family TV show, Keeping Up With The Kardashians , and wrote: "Happy birthday @robkardashian!! I am incredibly blessed to have a brother like you! You truly are one of the funniest people I've ever met! You have the most unbelievable heart and anyone who is fortunate enough to have you in their life knows what a positive impact you make on them!" 
Khloe also praised his bond with Dream, adding: "Seeing you be a daddy has been a blessing to see how she gives you that smile I miss. Precious Dream is your twin and it's such a beautiful thing to see. We've been by each other's side for life and that will never stop! You're 30 now, the age when Jesus turned water into wine (Your favorite fact) This is your year of greatness! We all believe in you! Happy birthday Rob! I love you (sic)." 
His sibling Kourtney posted a throwback picture of Rob kissing her son Mason and wrote: "Relationship goals. Bob, Bob...Happy Birthday Bob (sic)." 
And Rob's mother Kris Jenner shared a collage of pictures, writing: "Happy birthday @robkardashian!!!! I love you more than words can say. You have the sweetest soul and the kindest heart, and I am blessed beyond measure to call you my son. I am so proud of the man you have become and it brings me so much joy to watch you grow as a brother, son and father. There are so many blessings in this life, but being your mom is one of the greatest. I love you!! #HappybirthdayRob (sic)." Like us on Facebook
